title: Yeah, who cares about gambling
author: VD
content_html:
Mr. Reversion to the Mean strikes again:

Oh for Pete’s Sake [John Podhoretz]
Republican voters are going to stay at home because of internet gambling legislation? Um….let me think about this…hmmm….NO.

Right, because 10 million white guys with computers and plenty of disposable income aren’t the sort of people normally inclined to support Republicans… and they surely won’t hold the banning of their favorite pasttime against a group of politicians who are supposedly dedicated to the concept of government that doesn’t interfere in people’s lives.

I mean, it’s not as if gamblers tend to be obsessive about things, right?
